unnormalised: Athlete biographies are crucial for understanding sporting excellence. Reading about Sachin Tendulkar's early struggles in Mumbai or P.T. Usha's training in Kerala inspires us. Dr. Verghese Kurien's impact on Indian dairy (Amul) shows leadership. Sharing these stories, like Dhyan Chand's dedication, motivates young athletes. More coverage of athletes from smaller cities like Meerut (UP) is needed. Also, inclusion of details, such as training facility of 1500 sq ft or annual scholarship Rs. 50000, adds value.
